title.narrative: Mainstreaming DRM/DRR into the Agriculture Sector

description.narrative: This project aims to strengthen the enabling environment within the responsible institutions to support the DRM mainstreaming into the agriculture sector and build livelihood resilience of farmers, livestock holders and fisherfolks against disasters.

title.narrative: HCFC Phase-Out Management Plan Stage II

description.narrative: Guyana proposes to phase out HCFC by 2025, with a small percentage(2.5% total of baseline)till 2030.
To phase out ozone depleting substances in keeping with the targets set in the Guyana plan.
